review: I've been very happy with my Amazon fire TV with one exception . I am having occasional problems with the mirroring function on my Samsung ES 8000 60 inch TV which is routed through my Denon receiver as part of my home theater system. Other than that the fire TV video quality and sound quality is fantastic and the user interface is very easy to use . Once you login to all your accounts the first time , you need not do it again, as your accounts can be accessed through the fire TV box without having to sign in again each time . One other thing is that the resolution and quality of the screensaver photos is astounding . The FireTV has the highest quality screensaver photos I have seen anywhere and it is the best pictures I have ever seen on my television set . Apple TV screensaver can't hold a candle to the fire TV screensaver . My only complaint is that you can't run the screensaver indefinitely . It shuts off after about half an hour

review: I think the hardware is snappy and fast. However my main gripe is that the search command only works on the "home screen" that highlights amazon prime content. Although that makes sense since this is an amazon product, I wish to have the capability to use the search command while inside other apps such as Netflix, Youtube etc. Not enabling this really defeats the purpose of Amazon "fixing" the search command other streaming devices have. Otherwise I'm pretty happy with FireTV.
